recipe.title: The Fall Spritz
ingredients: 6 ounces chilled hard apple cider, preferably semi-dry
instructions: Pour apple cider and cognac into a Collins glass filled with ice. Light a match, let it burn 2 seconds to get rid of excess sulfur, and hold it 3" over cocktail and 1" away from peel; the outside of the peel should face down, over the drink. Squeeze peel to release oils into drink. Rub flamed peel around rim of glass, then place peel in glass.
